title: Tidal
description:
Home of Tidal Labs, a digital marketing company I was proud to work at. Initially, our team built out a full web app with marketplace/user logic, but eventually transitioned over to a more traditional landing site.

I oversaw the Tidal site through multiple redesigns and revisions. Primarily I owned the front-end stack, wrote our CSS style guide, and provided input for UI/UX decisions - all while learning PHP/Laravel, contributing to the back-end, and collaborating with both designers and marketing content producers.
